name: df-smo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0
body: |- wb(wsmo(c0), w3a(wf(c0, cdm(c0), con0), word(cdm(c0)), wral(s0, cdm(c0), wral(s1, cdm(c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))
comment: Definition of a strictly monotone ordinal function. Definition 7.46 in [TakeutiZaring] p. 50. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Nov-2011.)
